fees.description: $14.30 (inc. GST) Special Meter Read fee. This fee is passed through from your distributor and may vary.
$184.80 (inc. GST) fee may apply when your property is disconnected. This fee is passed through from your distributor and may vary.
$62.70 (inc. GST) fee may apply when your property is reconnected. This fee is passed through from your distributor and may vary.
$2.75 (inc. GST) Direct debit or Debit dishonour payment fee

gasContract.terms: See our full terms and conditions to www.covau.com.au for details.
gasContract.variation: We may vary the charges of this plan (including their amount, nature and structure) at any time by giving you a notice at least 5 business days prior to the effective date of variation. All prices listed are inclusive of GST except where indicated.
gasContract.onExpiryDescription: This agreement continues until you or we end it.
gasContract.additionalFeeInformation: For information on additional fees, please visit our website : www.covau.com.au
